name: Crime Syndicate
description:
Build your criminal empire and enter a world of money, crime and corruption.

Carry out jobs in over 30 distinct cities in order to earn, money and rise through the ranks of the criminal underworld. Carry out harder jobs to get better rewards.

Features:

  • Over 2 cities with 10 jobs per city.
  • Upgrade character stats to be stronger.
  • Kill randomly generated hit-men to earn rewards.
  • Saving and loading system where saved data can persist between multiple game sessions.

Coming Soon (Free updates roadmap)

  • Coming soon is a section of the game were players can purchase and upgrade properties. Each property will need security, an advisor and a manager.
  • Fully playable storyline that takes you through the criminal underworld as a two-bit thug to a crime syndicate.
  • Overarching stock market that is influenced by the player actions, killing a certain hit-men could reduce stock and increase others. Performing jobs in a specific city could increase crime and lower law enforcement.
  • Minigames; when you're ragged to the riches come to many of the starling casinos and wager away at slot games and various card-games.
  • Complete port to IOS and Android devices.
